verses.roman:
rādhā-saṅge kṛṣṇa-līlā-ei haila jñāne
ei rase magna prabhu ha-ilā āpane

synonyms: rādhā-saṅge—with Rādhārāṇī; kṛṣṇa-līlā—pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa; ei haila jñāne—this was His consciousness; ei rase magna—merged in this mellow; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ha-ilā āpane—remained personally.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was always thinking of the pastimes of Rādhā and Kṛṣṇa, and He remained personally merged in this consciousness.
